scripts.build: npx rimraf dist && tsc && gulp build:icons && rm -f dist/package.json && npm run copy:dist
scripts.copy:dist: cp -r dist packages/unscoped/ && cp -r dist packages/scoped/ && cp README.md LICENSE.md packages/unscoped/ && cp README.md LICENSE.md packages/scoped/
scripts.check:versions: node -e "const a=require('./packages/scoped/package.json').version; const b=require('./packages/unscoped/package.json').version; if(a!==b){console.error('Version mismatch:',a,b); process.exit(1)} else {console.log('Versions OK:',a)}"
